name: Processing Ore
description: Ore processing is a bit different in this world than what you might be used to. For one, the furnace is not easy to craft. Neither is the smeltery, for that matter. Very important note: $(bold)THE SMELTERY DOES NOT DOUBLE ORE.$() Another very important note: $(bold)NEITHER THE SMELTERY, THE QUARTZ GRINDSTONE, NOR THE FURNACE CAN PROCESS IRON ORE OF ANY TYPE.$()
